title: Computer Vision using Face Recognition
features: Designed and deployed a real-time face‑recognition attendance system with OpenCV and face embeddings, cutting manual check‑in time by 95% and ensuring 99% identity accuracy.
Developed a parking‑space detection pipeline using YOLOv5 and video analytics, achieving 92% detection precision on live traffic feeds and enabling automated parking assistance.
Built an intuitive gesture‑control module that maps hand‑pose landmarks to UI actions, improving accessibility for users with motor impairments and demonstrating robust hand‑distance estimation.
